attributes.action: Stop US agroproducts, poultry and meat failing UK standard entering UK markets.
attributes.additional_details: keep food standards level high and stop US agrobusinesses entering UK markets. This will have huge detrimental effect on our health and on our farmers. The only way they can survive is by reducing the quality of British products. This will stop us from selling to other markets. It will also have negative effect on our nations health.
attributes.background:
Government promised us over and over that chlorinated chicken, meat products from US and their agroproducts that do not meet our current standards will never enter UK markets. They should keep that promise.

This is terrible for our health, for our farmers and for the quality of British products.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign these petitions calling for the same action:

Disallow Food that is Lower than the Minimum UK Production & Welfare Standards: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/326837

Legislate in the Agriculture Bill to protect the UK’s Food & Farming Sector: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/321419
